Body:
exclude = Exclude()
exclude.appendComponent(Name('%00%02').get(0))
exclude.appendAny()
exclude.appendComponent(Name('%00%20').get(0))
component = Name('%00%01').get(0)
self.assertFalse(exclude.matches(component), component.toEscapedString() +
    ' should not match ' + exclude.toUri())
component = Name('%00%0F').get(0)
self.assertTrue(exclude.matches(component), component.toEscapedString() +
    ' should match ' + exclude.toUri())
component = Name('%00%21').get(0)
self.assertFalse(exclude.matches(component), component.toEscapedString() +
    ' should not match ' + exclude.toUri())
